actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Committee on Public Works discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 with regard to the amount of insurance required on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards.

summary.text: Limits the amount of insurance required on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards to the maximum amount required under the National Flood Insurance Act or the amount of real and personal property to which financial assistance received under the Flood Disaster Protection Act relates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 with regard to the amount of insurance required on buildings and mobile homes which are in areas having special flood hazards.
